articles.title: Kim Jong Il Visits Sariwon Chicken Farm and Migok Cooperative Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Visits Sariwon Chicken Farm and Migok Cooperative Farm
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the rebuilt Sariwon Chicken Farm and the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City.
					 Kim Jong Il first went to the chicken farm.
					
					 Noting that its employees have brought a new turn in breeding chickens through brisk technical innovation movement and in high revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, thus steadily boosting production, he gave appreciation of the efforts made by them devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm for the people.
					
					 He said that the officials, workers and technicians of the farm should provide the people with more chickens and eggs by sincerely performing their duties as faithful servants of the people as required by the slogan "Serve the People!"
					
					 Then he visited several places of the Migok Cooperative Farm to acquaint himself with the condition of this year's farm work.
					
					 Saying that the officials and agricultural working people of the farm intensely loyal to the Party and the revolution have done a lot of work in a few years by devoting themselves with ardent patriotism, he highly appreciated the revolutionary working spirit of them who are making steady and rapid progress without stagnation and inertia.
					
					 And he went round cultural and supply service facilities of the youth work-team newly built by the farm.
					
					 After watching a bedroom, a mess hall, subsidiary food store, a kitchen and other supply service facilities of the boarding house, he expressed great satisfaction at the fact that the members of the youth work-team are keeping their workplace clean and leading their life in a revolutionary and optimistic manner by following the example of the People's Army. And he highly praised them for having played the vanguard role in the agricultural front.
					
					 The agricultural front is the main front of weighty importance in solving the problems of clothes, food, and housing for the people, he said, stressing the need for the entire Party, the whole country and all the people to keep concentrating efforts on farming and thus bring about an epochal turn in agricultural production.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Generals of the Korean People's Army Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Minsok Street in Sariwon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Minsok Street in Sariwon
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il went round Minsok (folklore) Street built in the city of Sariwon.
					 Very satisfied at the fact that the builders have successfully constructed the folklore street of peculiar style by properly carrying forward and developing the national cultural inheritance true to the WPK's policy, he gave a high appreciation of their feat.
					
					 Deeply reflected in the folk customs native to Korea, developed and enriched through a long history, are the national characteristics such as creative wisdom and skills, tastes and fancy of the resourceful and industrious Korean people, he said. Then he advanced the highly important tasks that will serve as guidelines in preserving the tradition of superior folk customs.
					
					 It is very good that materials for education in history are graphically furnished in the street to give a visual panorama of the intelligent and sagacious Korean nation's superiority, he said, adding: Such centers for education in history should be built massively in Mt. Taesong and other places associated with a long tradition in the coming years.
					
					 He stressed that to be cautious of both restorationism and national nihilism by combining the principle of fidelity to historical truth with the principle of modernity is the policy invariably pursued by the WPK in carrying forward and developing the national cultural inheritance. This principle has been strictly adhered to over the past years and, after all, the superior national culture created by the ancestors has been developing into the genuine culture of the working people in the era of the Workers' Party, he said.
					
					 The role of officials and scientists in the field of history including historicians is of great importance in properly preserving the tradition of folk customs, he said, calling for paying deep attention to the researches for academically ascertaining the folk customs native to Korea.
					
					 He held that all the superior folk customs, created by the ancestors, including traditional dishes, games and etiquette should be found out in the present time and developed to suit the modern aesthetic sense, thus making the national fragrance further prevail all over the society.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Generals of the Korean People's Army Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Greetings to Kenyan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kenyan President
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mwai Kibaki, President of the Republic of Kenya, on Wednesday on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of the independence of Kenya.
					 Kim in the message said that the Korean people rejoice as over their own over many successes made by the Kenyan people in their work to consolidate the peace and security of the country and achieve socio-economic progress. 
					
					 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Kenya, which have embarked upon the new road of development, would steadily grow stronger thanks to the bilateral understanding and common efforts, the message sincerely wished the president good health and happiness as well as big success in his noble work.

articles.title: Kumsusan Memorial Palace Visited by Endless Stream of People
articles.content:
Kumsusan Memorial Palace Visited by Endless Stream of People
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Kumsusan Memorial Palace, holy temple of Juche where President Kim Il Sung lies in state, has been visited by more than 880,000 people including servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people, overseas compatriots and foreigners this year. 
					 The servicepersons and people from all walks of life visited the palace where they paid homage in humble reverence to the President who dedicated his whole life to the country and its people.
					
					 Overseas compatriots and foreign leaders and figures made entries in the visitor's book highly praising the immortal exploits performed by the President before the times and history. They include Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Yang Yong Dong, chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, and Mohammad Javad Haji Ali Akbari, vice-president of Iran, Amama Mbabazi, general secretary of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Keith Bennet, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean who is chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, and Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Revolutionary Battle Sites and Revolutionary Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Draw Endless Crowd of Visitors
articles.content:
Revolutionary Battle Sites and Revolutionary Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Draw Endless Crowd of Visitors
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- At least 1.4 million servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, people from all walks of life and school youth and children have visited revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area of Mt. Paektu up to this date from the outset of this significant year in order to give steady continuity to the march of the revolution that started in the forest of Mt. Paektu.
					 Senior officials of the party, army and state, officials of units at all levels in Pyongyang and local areas, servicepersons of the KPA and working people in Ryanggang Province visited the old home of General Secretary Kim Jong Il in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu to hold an oath-taking meeting with splendor for celebrating February 16, his birthday, in the camp.
					
					 The study tour group of school youth and children from across the country toured the revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of February 16.
					
					 At least 240,000 visitors toured the anti-Japanese battle areas in the month of August which marked the 20th anniversaries of the field guidance given by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to the secret camp in Mt. Paektu and the naming of "Jong Il Peak."

articles.title: Rare Animals on Steady Increase at Central Zoo
articles.content:
Rare Animals on Steady Increase at Central Zoo
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The number of rare animals is steadily increasing at the Central Zoo at the foot of picturesque Mt. Taesong.
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il made sure that the Central Zoo was reconstructed on an expansion basis, indicated an orientation and ways of sprucing it up well under a long-term plan and sent many rare animals to it in order to provide people with better conditions for cultural and emotional life. 
					
					 At least 650 animals of more than 100 species have been sent to the zoo in more than 40 installments this year to be helpful to the working people's cultural and emotional life and the education and upbringing of youth and children. 
					
					 44 dogs of 17 species for admiration were sent to the zoo recently.
					
					 88 dogs of 24 species for admiration have been lived the zoo since January this year to please the visitors.
					
					 Those animals that found their habitats in the zoo this year are rare animals habitant in our country and different parts of the world. 
					
					 Among them are 60 gift animals of 9 species which were presented to Kim Jong Il from a Kuwaiti zoo. They are adding to the scenic beauty of the zoo.

articles.title: Beauty Spots Change Appearances
articles.content:
Beauty Spots Change Appearances
Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Scenic spots have been wonderfully arranged to ensure better cultural and emotional life to the people in the DPRK.
					The Ryongaksan Pleasure Park in Pyongyang permeated with the warm love of the three generals of Mt. Paektu for the people has undergone a complete change.
					
					The roads for climbing up Mt. Ryongak were leveled well and railings set up along the roads leading to curious rocks and other beauty spots. An observation platform was built on a rock in front of the Popun Temple, a relic belonging to Koguryo (277 B.C.-668 A.D.) so as to command a bird's-eye view of landscape of mountains and streams.
					
					Resting sites and service facilities were set up properly here and there and various species of trees and flower trees planted to add beauty to the scenery of the mountain.
					
					Mt. Jangsu, which is called Hwanghaekumgang (Mt. Kumgang in Hwanghae Province), has put on a new look.
					
					Tens of kilometers-long road linking 12 turns of Mt. Jangsu was broadened and tens of kilometers-long tourist and mountaineering roads were built newly.
					
					Observation platforms were built on Pojok and Hanui Hills, where visitors can enjoy a bird's-eye view of the beauty of the celebrated mountain and Unpha and Jangsu Lakes and hotels and folk game centers were constructed in different places for sightseers.
					
					The Paekunsan Pleasure Park in Yonggwang County, South Hamgyong Province had colorful resting sites, pavilions and several camp-buildings constructed and some 20 kilometer-long sightseeing road from the Sanju Falls to Tongdae Falls was widened.
					
					Besides, the Sokam Beauty Spot of South Phyongan Province and other scenic spots with folk game sites were arranged better to delight the visitors.

articles.title: Many Legends of Human Love Recorded This Year
articles.content:
Many Legends of Human Love Recorded This Year
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- A lot of legendary stories on human love touching the heart's chord of all people have been recorded in the DPRK as usual in Juche 97 (2008).
					It is a common practice and noble ethics to donate one's blood and flesh to others in the DPRK where the whole land is a large and harmonious family in which all people help and pull each other along.
					
					 The story of human love in Kangwon Province gives a glimpse of this fact.
					
					 A two-year-old child, who got third degree burns on 35 percent of the body, was carried to the Thongchon County People's Hospital in early January this year.
					
					 All the county people turned out to bring the child back to life, which brooked not a moment's delay.  The hospital staff, officials and residents of the county, more than 800 men and women in all, donated their skin without hesitation in ten skin grafting operations on the child.
					
					Doctors' consultations were held on thirty occasions after the operations and nutritive foodstuffs of 370 kilograms in 14 kinds went into the recovery of the patient.
					
					 Such emotional story came from South Hamgyong Province in November. More than 600 persons vied with each other in donating their blood and skin in rescuing a worker of the Pujongang Hydro-power Station who suffered third degree burns on 67 percent of his body. Among them were the medical staff of the provincial people's hospital, workers of the power station who ran over 40 kilometers to the hospital and working people of Hamhung City.
					
					 Among those who added a story to the legends of human love are the officials, doctors and nurses of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Hospital.
					
					 A furnaceman thrown into the danger of losing his eyesight by an accident was carried to the hospital some time ago.
					
					 He got cornea, sclerotitis and eyelid burns which had not yet been cured clinically. The only way to save his eyes was to transplant other's bulbar conjunctivas on him.
					
					 A total of 29 of the medical group of the hospital including operators, old doctors and a girl nurse with her wedding day a few days off devoted their precious bulbar conjunctivas to the furnaceman without stint.
					
					 When he came back to the worksite after recovering his eyesight amid the love and devotion of the most beautiful and noble people, the furnacemen said the people-centered socialist system under which the leader and the people are a harmonious whole was the best.
					
					 More beautiful stories of human love are being told at this moment in the DPRK, which a foreigner called in an excited tone "Heaven of beautiful stories" and "kingdom of kind-hearted people".

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppets' Arms Buildup Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppets' Arms Buildup Blasted
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. bellicose forces are mulling the deployment of three squadrons of F-22 capable of mounting a preemptive attack in U.S. military bases in the Pacific region with the Korean Peninsula as an operation theatre. The Lee Myung Bak group is backing the U.S. war moves and getting zealously involved in them. These military moves come under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Thursday.
					 These moves are grave acts of disturbing peace and stability in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and driving the situation there to the phase of war as they are obvious military moves against the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of the U.S. imperialist warlike forces to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup was prompted by an adventurous scenario of the U.S. imperialist warlike forces to secure an "upper hand of strength" in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and attack the DPRK.
					
					 What is more dangerous is that the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea is going reckless as servants for the U.S. in its moves to start a nuclear war. 
					
					 Under the situation prevailing on the peninsula, there is an increasing likelihood of any military move that may provoke the opponent to develop into a war. The extremely dangerous arms buildup stepped up by the bellicose forces of the U.S. and south Korea is rendering the situation on the peninsula so tense that a war may break out there any time.
					
					 The DPRK neither wants a war nor fears it. The frantic racket of the warmongers at home and abroad to start a war against the DPRK only reinforces the revolutionary will of its servicepersons and people to bolster its military deterrent in every way to prevent a war on the peninsula.
					
					 The above-said warmongers would be well advised to stop the arms buildup, cogitating about a high price they will have to pay for their reckless war moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Bound to Face Judgment of History
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Bound to Face Judgment of History
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group will never be pardoned for betraying the nation and swimming against the trend of the times, subservient to the foreign aggressor forces but will face a stern punishment of history. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday warns this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Lee group in south Korea is persisting in its desperate moves against the nation and reunification, pursuant to foreign forces' hostile policy toward the DPRK and taking advantage of their maneuvers to provoke a nuclear war quite contrary to the need of the era of independence and the aspiration of the nation after reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 It is an act of treachery to challenge the cause of independent reunification, negating the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					Had the Lee Myung Bak group neither negated the north-south joint declarations nor adopted the confrontation with fellow countrymen as its policy, the inter-Korean relations would have not reached the present phase of total severance. With nothing can the group of traitors evade the responsibility for having deliberately pushed the inter-Korean relations to stalemate.
					
					 The group is now being cursed, rebuffed and condemned by all Koreans for escalating the confrontation between the north and the south and increasing the danger of a war in collusion with foreign aggressor forces, dead-set against the just cause of national reconciliation, unity and the independent reunification. 
					
					 With no desperate efforts can the Lee group hold in check the advance of the era of independent reunification in which all Koreans pool their efforts in the spirit of "By our nation itself" under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: A-Bomb Victims of S. Korea Demand Reparation from Japanese Government
articles.content:
A-Bomb Victims of S. Korea Demand Reparation from Japanese Government
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- At least 380 A-bomb victims of south Korea filed lawsuits all at once in local courts in Hiroshima, Nagasaki and Osaka, Japan against the Japanese government in demand of its reparation.
					 They fell victim to A-bombs after being drafted by the Japanese imperialists to Japan for military service and forced labor.
					
					 But the Japanese government has not paid them reparation for the mere reason that they did not live in Japan after the end of the war.
					
					Recalling that they have suffered a lot due to the behavior of Japan, they urged the Japanese government to immediately pay reparation to all victims.
					
					 Meanwhile, it was reported that more than 2,000 A-bomb victims in south Korea and bereaved families of the 980 A-bomb victims who have already died are making arrangements to file similar lawsuits.

articles.title: Sit-in Strike Launched against Moves to Institute Evil Law
articles.content:
Sit-in Strike Launched against Moves to Institute Evil Law
Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Members of the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Democratic Labor Party launched an emergency sit-in strike on the situation to "prevent Lee Myung Bak from enacting an evil law aimed at deteriorating the people's living and democracy" outside the "National Assembly" building in Seoul on December 8. 
					 Speakers at a press conference held earlier said that the south Korean society is now finding itself in an evermore serious and crucial emergency situation due to the Lee "government's" moves to enact an evil law, adding that they would carry on the sit-in strike in protest against the present regime which has brought the people's living to destitution and trampled down upon the democratic rights.
					
					 They declared that they would curb and foil the moves to institute an unpopular evil law by enlisting the efforts of the people of broad strata critical of the Lee "government". 
					
					 Noting that the "government's" brutal suppression is nothing but reckless acts of those in the grip of a crisis as it only precipitates its self-destruction, they called on all forces that share a will to solidarize with each other and wage an uncompromising stubborn struggle against it.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions took place in Guinea, Ethiopia and the Czech Republic from December 2 to 5 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Riad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, said that the Songun politics pursued in all fields of socialist Korea at present is widely known to the international community as the most powerful and successful political mode in the present times.
					
					 The more than 80 year-long Korean revolution has made a victorious advance under the banner of the Songun idea as well as the Juche idea, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The Songun politics as well as the Juche idea, a great guiding idea in the era of independence, will always demonstrate its might as an invincible weapon for accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Suk energetically led the work to awaken the women of broad strata and rally them organizationally and ideologically true to the idea of the women's movement propounded by President Kim Il Sung, adding that the noble feats performed by Kim Jong Suk for the strengthening and development of the movement for the women's emancipation will shine forever.
					
					 Meanwhile, a reading session on Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was held in the Czech Republic.
					
					 A seminar on the Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il took place in the Czech Republic on December 4 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported by Intl' Meeting
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported by Intl' Meeting
 Pyongyang, December 11 (KCNA) -- A resolution supporting the Korean people in their struggle for defending and advancing the cause of socialism was adopted at the 10th international meeting of communist and workers' parties held in Brasilia from Nov. 21 to 23 with delegations of 65 parties from 54 countries attending.
					 The resolution said that the Korean people have purposefully waged a struggle for accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism, the cause of socialism even under the complicated international situation where the U.S. imperialists have perpetrated high-handed and arbitrary practices, aggression and intervention against the independent countries.
					
					 In the recent years the Korean people have achieved great successes in their efforts to increase the self-reliant defence capability, reenergize the national economy and hasten the independent reunification of the country under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea guided by the unique Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, it noted, and stressed:
					
					The communist and workers' parties from various countries of the world attending the tenth international meeting of those parties express support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of the WPK, regarding it as an important link in the chain for defending and advancing the cause of independence against imperialism, the cause of socialism worldwide to positively support the Songun revolutionary cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Mas de un millon 400 mil personas visitan este ano zona de monte Paektu
articles.content:
Mas de un millon 400 mil personas visitan este ano zona de monte Paektu
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Mas de un millon 400 mil oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos estratos, jovenes y ninos escolares visitaron este ano los campos de combates antiguos y los lugares historicos de la revolucion en la zona del monte Paektu.
					Especialmente, los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, funcionarios de las instituciones centrales y locales a todos los niveles, oficiales y soldados del EPC, asi como trabajadores de la provincia de Ryanggang celebraron con solemnidad el acto de juramento ante la casa natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu en ocasion del 16 de febrero (cumpleanos del Dirigente).
					
					En ocasion de la misma efemeride, la caravana nacional de jovenes y ninos escolares realizo el recorrido por los campos de combates antiguos y los lugares historicos de la revolucion en esta zona.
					
					En particular, visitaron los escenarios de batallas antijaponesas mas de 240 mil personas solo en agosto pasado cuando se cumplieron 20 anos de la direccion en el terreno al referido campamento secreto por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y de la denominacion del "Pico Jongil".

articles.title: Se aumentan animales raros en Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Se aumentan animales raros en Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Para asegurar al pueblo las condiciones culturales mas favorables, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo reconstruir y ampliar el Parque Zoologico Nacional, dio el rumbo y los medios para acondicionarlo comodamente con vistas al futuro y envio muchos animales raros.
					Este ano, mas de 650 animales de mas de 100 especies se trasladaron en mas de 40 ocasiones a este parque zoologico situado al pie del pintoresco monte Taesong y sirven a la vida cultural y la educacion para los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					 En los ultimos dias fueron trasladados ahi 44 perros ornamentales de 17 especies.
					
					Ademas, dan alegria a los visitantes los 88 perros de 24 especies que viven aqui desde enero pasado.
					
					Los animales trasladados este ano al parque zoologico son raros que habitan en nuestro pais y en otras regiones del mundo.
					
					 Entre ellos figuran los 60 animales de 9 especies que el parque zoologico de Kuwait regalo al Dirigente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia aumento armamentista de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los belicistas norteamericanos intentan emplazar de modo concentrado 3 batallones de cazabombarderos Stealth "F-22", capacitados para el ataque preventivo, en sus bases militares en la region del Pacifico cuyo teatro operacional es la Peninsula Coreana.
					Por otra parte, la banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea se hace complice activo en tal aumento armamentista y otras maniobras belicistas del imperio.
					
					Comienza un comentario individual insertado en la edicion de este jueves del diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					Esa medida militar contra la RPDC deviene una grave provocacion para tronchar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Nordeste Asiatico y llevar la situacion al borde de la guerra.
					
					El aumento armamentista por parte de EE.UU. parte de su invariable y aventurera ambicion de tomar la "superioridad de la fuerza" en la Peninsula Coreana y en la region del Nordeste Asiatico y atropellar a la RPDC por via militar.
					
					Lo mas peligroso del caso es que la banda de Lee Myung Bak se porta tan rabiosamente siendo lacayo al servicio de la politica de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					 En la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana es muy probable que se convierta en la guerra real cualquier movimiento militar provocativo a la contraparte.
					
					 Sin embargo, las fuerzas belicistas yanquis y surcoreanas desarrollan abiertamente ese aumento armamentista tan peligroso llevando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a punto de la guerra.
					
					 La RPDC no desea la guerra, pero tampoco la teme.
					
					 Cuanto mas freneticas sean las maniobras agresivas anti-RPDC de los belicistas internos y externos, tanto mas firme sera la voluntad revolucionaria del ejercito y el pueblo de ella de consolidar por todos los medios sus fuerzas armadas para disuadir la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los provocadores deben parar ahora mismo su campana de aumento armamentista meditando en que les van a costar muy caro sus imprudentes maniobras belicistas anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Banda de Lee Myung Bak sera condenada por historia y nacion
articles.content:
Banda de Lee Myung Bak sera condenada por historia y nacion
Pyongyang, 11 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Las maniobras de la banda de Lee Myung Bak, que traiciona a la nacion y desafia a la tendencia de la epoca en adhesion a las fuerzas foraneas agresoras, no pueden ser toleradas en ningun caso ni evadir la severa sentencia de la historia.
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado este jueves y prosigue:
					
					En complicidad con la politica hostil a Corea de las fuerzas extranjeras y con sus maniobras para la provocacion de guerra nuclear, la banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea recurre mas obstinadamente a los cruentos tejemanejes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion en contrasentido a la demanda de la epoca de independencia y a la aspiracion nacional a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion.
					
					Su peor crimen antinacional es desafiar a la causa de reunificacion independiente negando la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Si la banda de Lee no hubiera negado tales documentos aprobados entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea ni formulado en su politica la confrontacion fratricida, las relaciones intercoreanas no correrian el riesgo de ruptura total como ahora.
					
					La banda del traidor Lee no podra eludir por nada la responsabilidad por haber roto intencionalmente las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Es objeto de maldiciones, censura y repudio de toda la nacion esa horda, que se opone tercamente a la justa causa por la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion independiente de la nacion, agrava la confrontacion fratricida y acrecienta el peligro de la guerra en colaboracion con las fuerzas extranjeras agresoras.
					
					Por muy desesperadas que fueran las maniobras de los pandilleros de Lee, nunca parara el avance de la epoca de reunificacion independiente en que los compatriotas marchan adelante uniendo sus fuerzas bajo la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
